rows.label: tev001093_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh. Hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0002
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001093_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Phog what he's doing.

rows.label: tev001093_JNK0020
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: tev001093_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Phog if he's been counting the ants.

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0006
rows.name: I've been counting ants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0007
rows.name:
Boz√© told me that when he meditates,
he focuses his thoughts on a single thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0008
rows.name: I decided to focus on counting ants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0009
rows.name: Much to my surprise...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0010
rows.name: It has proven to be a profound experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0011
rows.name:
These ants are every bit as resilient as the ones
back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0012
rows.name:
There wasn't a single ant on the White Whale,
and yet Mira's ants have already found their way
here and managed to construct a nest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0013
rows.name: And now these tiny creatures live in this giant city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0014
rows.name: Impressive. You are exactly right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0015
rows.name:
These ants are every bit as resilient as the ones
on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0016
rows.name:
There wasn't a single ant on the White Whale,
and yet Mira's ants have already found their way
here and managed to construct a nest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0017
rows.name: And now these tiny creatures live in this giant city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0018
rows.name: It's that thought that led me to observe them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_JNK0030
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: tev001093_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim that humans are every bit as resilient as the ants.

rows.label: tev001093_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001093_SEL0041
rows.name: Join Phog in celebrating these amazing creatures.

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0019
rows.name:
That's a good point. We've also managed to live
among much larger species since we arrived on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0020
rows.name:
Let's hope that we can continue to survive as ably as
our ant friends here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0021
rows.name: I, too, find myself rooting for these ants to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0022
rows.name: I'm glad you feel the same way, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0023
rows.name: The thing is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0024
rows.name:
You stepped on five of them when you came over to
talk to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001093_MSG0025
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]
